## Background Information
The tender is for a Tableau Creator Subscription and Tableau Server Eight Core (or equivalent) Support Renewal for November 2023. Potential bidders must register in the Shared Services Canada P2P portal to:

* View and access solicitations from SSC
* Submit a response to a solicitation
* Receive updates and amendments regarding solicitations
* Be awarded contracts and receive contract amendments
* Submit invoices and receive payment status updates.

Submission through the P2P portal is mandatory for all bidders. 

The scheduled tender closing date was 2023-11-07 14:00:00, but the tender is now expired. 

Please note that you have to re-check for an accurate contract description via the Shared Services Canada tender hyperlink, since it may contain an up-to-date information about the contract.  The provided description might be outdated and should only be used as an abstraction.  Therefore, for an accuracy detail you have to consult the Shared Services Canada tender description for an  exact information. 

Please reach out to Sandra Ladouceur for more details.
